div.head: 產後敗血衝心
div.div: rotten blood surging to the heart following delivery

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Chan hou bai xue chong xin

entry.def: rotten blood surging to the heart following delivery

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chan hou bai xue gong xin 產後敗血攻心 , rotten blood attacking the heart following delivery. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yu jin 鬱金：治血氣心腹痛， 產後敗血衝心欲死 , “It cures pain in heart and abdomen because of blood and qi [stagnation], as well as rotten blood surging to the heart following delivery [causing pain so severe that patients] wish to die”.
